summary: Change shout time to a more useable level, it will now pay of the actually find shouts
descriptionHtml:
Change shout time to a more useable level, it will now pay of to actually find shouts 

Simply changes shout time, so now the can be used for more than just emergancys.

Most of the shout have had their time reduced to zero, while some overpowered shouts have recived a huge decrease in time.

All times are listed i sec.

Shout name: \"first word\", \"Second word\", \"Third word\"

Animal Allegiance: 0, 0, 0
Aura Whisper: 0, 0, 0
Become Ethereal: 0, 0, 0
Call Dragon: 0, 0, 150
Call of Valor: 1, 1, 1
Clear Skies: 0, 0, 1
Disarm: 0, 0, 1
Dismay 0, 1, 2
Dragonrend 0, 2, 5
Elemental Fury: 0, 0, 0
Fire Breath: 0, 0, 0
Frost Breath: 0, 0, 0
Ice Form: 0, 0, 0
Kyne\'s Peace: 0, 0, 0
Marked for Death: 0, 0, 0
Slow Time: 0, 2, 5
Storm Call: 10, 15, 20
Throw Voice: 0, 0, 0
Unrelenting Force: 0, 0, 0
Whirlwind Sprint: 0, 0, 0 

-------------------------------------------------
three other version are available with the following time:

First the version with no cooldown for any of the shouts

Second version

Disarm: 3, 7, 15

Frost Breath: 3, 5, 10
Ice Form: 3, 7, 15
Kyne\'s Peace: 3, 7, 15
Marked for Death: 3, 7, 15
Slow Time: 3, 7, 15
Storm Call: 3, 15, 30
Throw Voice: 3, 2, 1
Unrelenting Force: 3, 7, 15
Whirlwind Sprint: 3, 7, 15

Third version

author: Zlepper
